thread.title: It's true, grammar schools are not about equality - that's why we should build more of them
thread.title_full: It's true, grammar schools are not about equality - that's why we should build more of them

author: Charles Moore
title: It's true, grammar schools are not about equality - that's why we should build more of them
text: It's true, grammar schools are not about equality - that's why we should build more of them Our weird compulsion to expect a uniform national educational system fails our children Must we really tear down grammars, like this one - St. Michael's Grammar School in North Finchley Photo: Julian Andrews
